sentences.sContent: Next time such an apology is likely to happen swiftly and immediately as women candidates set up media watchdog brigades to force the media to give them more equal treatment.
sentences.sContent_eng: Next time such an apology is likely to happen swiftly and immediately as women candidates set up media watchdog brigades to force the media to give them more equal treatment.
sentences.sCn: 下一次这类道歉可能会很快地和迅速地得到处理因为女性候选人建立了媒体监察队来强迫媒体给她们一个更公平的对待。

remMethod.val: 来自swift(a. 迅速的， 快的)

words.tran: 快的；迅速的；敏捷的；立刻的
